title: Japanese companies' pretax profits rise 19% in July-September
description: Pretax profits at Japanese companies in the July-September period rose 19.7 percent from a year earlier to 27.54 trillion yen, marking a fourth straight quarterly increase, driven by strong demand in the field of artificial intelligence, the Finance Ministry said Monday. Although pretax profits in the transportation equipment sector tumbled…

title: Who’s Afraid of the AI Boogeyman?
description: Understand the benefits and fears surrounding Artificial Intelligence (AI) and its potential to replace human jobs in various sectors.

title: TRD Network Announces Presale Stage 1 and Introduces Its AI-Enhanced DePIN Infrastructure Initiative
description: New York, USA, Dec. 01, 2025 (GLOBE NEWSWIRE) -- TRD Network today announced the upcoming launch of Presale Stage 1 and shared new information about its AI-enhanced Decentralized Physical Infrastructure Network (DePIN), developed to support more adaptive and resilient decentralized systems. This milestone marks the definitive moment for investors to acquire tokens in an ecosystem built to merge the efficiency of Artificial Intelligence with the security and resilience of decentralized physical resources.

title: OpenAI buys stake in Thrive Holdings to push AI into accounting, IT services
description: ChatGPT-maker OpenAI has taken a stake in private equity firm Thrive Holdings as part of a partnership to embed artificial intelligence into traditional industries such as accounting and IT services,...
content:
Dec 1 (Reuters) - ChatGPT-maker OpenAI has taken a stake in private equity firm Thrive Holdings as part of a partnership to embed artificial intelligence into traditional industries such as accounting and IT services, the companies said on Monday.

title: Bannon, top conservatives urge White House to reject Big Tech's 'fair use' push to justify AI copyright theft
description: A group of prominent conservatives including Steve Bannon are urging the Trump administration to reject an increasingly popular argument that tech giants are using to rip off copyrighted content to train artificial intelligence models.
content:
Prominent conservatives including Steve Bannon are urging the Trump administration to reject an increasingly popular argument that tech giants are using to rip off copyrighted material to train artificial intelligence.

title: AI could train the next generation of surgeons
description: In an increasingly acute surgeon shortage, artificial intelligence could help fill the gap, coaching med students as they practice surgical techniques.
content:

title: Data center planned for Bay Area office building site leased by Nvidia
description: A big data center is being planned at an empty San Jose office building in a fresh example of the changes the artificial intelligence boom has brought to the Bay Area's economic and tech landscapes.
content:
